[Accessing W&M VDI in Windows](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pZh-fMoaV54&list=PLiOhBg8WdMaLx_cg5FmBEA0hUvnrsplKl&index=19&t=0s)
:   This video details how to access W&M's Virtual Desktop Infrastructure (VDI) using the VMWare Horizon Client on a Windows machine.

[Adding Data from ArcGIS Online](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=d588gI3yjxY&list=PLiOhBg8WdMaLx_cg5FmBEA0hUvnrsplKl&index=2&t=0s)

:   This video details how to add spatial data to an ArcGIS Pro project from local drives and online portals.

:   This video details how to use the Buffer Geoprocessing Tool in ArcGIS Pro.

:   This video tutorial demonstrates how to calculate field statistics within a feature layer's attribute table.

:   In ArcGIS Pro, you can quickly create new polygon features using the right-angle tool.

:   This video details how to insert and format a map frame for use as an inset map, and how to insert an extent indicator, for a layout in ArcGIS Pro.

[Create Layout](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cB0PRHC3MWM&list=PLiOhBg8WdMaLx_cg5FmBEA0hUvnrsplKl&index=40&t=0s)
:   This video details how to insert a new layout to ArcGIS Pro.

[Create Map Project on Geospatial Drive](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HojjOPwneJw&list=PLiOhBg8WdMaLx_cg5FmBEA0hUvnrsplKl&index=3&t=0s)

:   This video details how to insert and format a legend for use in a layout in ArcGIS Pro.

[Creating a New Map Project on a Local Drive](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RnAtZFVer0I&list=PLiOhBg8WdMaLx_cg5FmBEA0hUvnrsplKl&index=28&t=0s)
:   This video details how to create a New ArcGIS Pro Project using the Map Template, while saving to a local drive.

[Creating/Digitizing Features](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2S2OVYpKLKc&list=PLiOhBg8WdMaLx_cg5FmBEA0hUvnrsplKl&index=47&t=0s)
:   This video details how to create features, using the process of digitizing buildings from imagery, in ArcGIS Pro.

[Edit Feature Class Metadata](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sn0SthObvYU&list=PLiOhBg8WdMaLx_cg5FmBEA0hUvnrsplKl&index=46&t=0s)
:   This video details how to edit metadata for a Feature Class or a Feature Layer in ArcGIS Pro.

[Edit Polygon Features](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rHaiyM3yyG0&list=PLiOhBg8WdMaLx_cg5FmBEA0hUvnrsplKl&index=45&t=0s)
:    This video details how to modify polygon features in ArcGIS Pro, using reshaping tools.

[Editing Attribute Tables](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=molt6hCx5TA&list=PLiOhBg8WdMaLx_cg5FmBEA0hUvnrsplKl&index=17&t=0s)
:   This video details how to edit attribute tables in ArcGIS Pro. This includes adding and configuring fields, calculating field values, and saving edits to attributes.

[Enable Labels](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pOlNALeldCU&list=PLiOhBg8WdMaLx_cg5FmBEA0hUvnrsplKl&index=15&t=0s)
:   This video details how to turn on and configure labels for a feature layer in ArcGIS Pro.

[Enabling and Configuring Labels for Line Features](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XEQcKiIzguA&list=PLiOhBg8WdMaLx_cg5FmBEA0hUvnrsplKl&index=7&t=0s)
:   This video details how to turn on and configure labels for Line Features in ArcGIS Pro.

[Export Layout](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CbzCFV3vDzU&list=PLiOhBg8WdMaLx_cg5FmBEA0hUvnrsplKl&index=39&t=0s)
:   This video details how to share a finished layout as a pdf in ArcGIS Pro.

[Finding and Downloading TIGER/Line Geography](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1OyRJ0TY0C4&list=PLiOhBg8WdMaLx_cg5FmBEA0hUvnrsplKl&index=43&t=0s)
:   This video details how to search for and download shapefiles and state-level geodatabases from the U.S. Census Bureau.

[Formatting Numeric Legends](https://youtu.be/V3c4nOQwJRk)
:   This video details how to format numeric attribute value labels---such as how to round to significant digits, assign percentages, add thousands separator commas, or add a suffix (e.g., units)---in preparation for creating a map legend in ArcGIS Pro.

[Formatting Point Symbology](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7WhX9Matx5A&list=PLiOhBg8WdMaLx_cg5FmBEA0hUvnrsplKl&index=16&t=0s)
:   This video details how to format symbology for point feature layers in ArcGIS Pro.

[Getting License for ArcGIS Pro](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=m00xLPt5vxw&list=PLiOhBg8WdMaLx_cg5FmBEA0hUvnrsplKl&index=21&t=0s)
:   This video details how to retrieve a license to use ArcGIS Pro using the W&M Enterprise login option.

[How to Connect to the Geospatial Network Drive](https://youtu.be/CIj_Ykl-vyM)
:   This video details how to connect to the Geospatial (U:) Network Drive from an off-campus location, by accessing William & Mary's Virtual Private Network (VPN) using Global Protect.

[How to make a layout in ArcGIS Online](https://youtu.be/i0TlNfeJ2Aw)
:   This video tutorial demonstrates how to create a layout from a Web Map in ArcGIS Online (AGOL).

[Insert Map Frame](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=I7DBm_i3-zE&list=PLiOhBg8WdMaLx_cg5FmBEA0hUvnrsplKl&index=36&t=0s)
:   This video details how to insert a map frame to a layout in ArcGIS Pro.

[Insert Service Layer Credits](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=efeJpbwpPNs&list=PLiOhBg8WdMaLx_cg5FmBEA0hUvnrsplKl&index=42&t=0s)
:    This video details how to insert and move service layer credits in a layout in ArcGIS Pro.

[Layer Properties](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XwBTt6GIo6U&list=PLiOhBg8WdMaLx_cg5FmBEA0hUvnrsplKl&index=14&t=0s)
:   This video details how to explore layer properties for a vector feature layer.

[Project](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0Kmy-ryzUQE&list=PLiOhBg8WdMaLx_cg5FmBEA0hUvnrsplKl&index=23&t=0s)
:   This video details how to use the "Project" Geoprocessing Tool in ArcGIS Pro.

[Project Raster](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rzGPRB-hUig&list=PLiOhBg8WdMaLx_cg5FmBEA0hUvnrsplKl&index=12&t=0s)
:   This video details how to use the "Project Raster" Geoprocessing Tool in ArcGIS Pro.

[Raster to Polygon: Continuous Data](https://youtu.be/47p5Bh9dY8A)
:   This video provides an example of how to convert a continuous raster into a polygon in ArcGIS Pro using the Extract By Mask and Raster to Polygon geoprocessing tools before hosting the layer to ArcGIS Online.
    To reduce the number of unique polygons, the masked raster is first classified into a set number of categories based on pixel value ranges using the Reclassify tool.

[Raster to Polygon: Discrete Data](https://youtu.be/4Z35iDIp2jw)
:   This video provides an example of how to convert a discrete raster into a polygon using ArcGIS Pro's Extract By Mask and Raster to Polygon geoprocessing tools before hosting the layer to ArcGIS Online.

[Rename Feature Layer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dBW0DEk5WSE&list=PLiOhBg8WdMaLx_cg5FmBEA0hUvnrsplKl&index=41&t=0s)
:   This video details how to change the display name of a feature layer for a map in ArcGIS Pro.

[Select by Attribute: Filtering in AGOL](https://youtu.be/CToxr2zFzR4)
:   This video details how to use the Filter tool in ArcGIS Online to select features from a layer by their attribute value using the expression builder.

[Select Layer by Attribute](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uYgSRd3ppuc&list=PLiOhBg8WdMaLx_cg5FmBEA0hUvnrsplKl&index=22&t=0s)
:   This video details how to use the "Select Layer by Attribute" Geoprocessing Tool in ArcGIS Pro.

[Setting Visibility Range for a Layer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zkvTdGaBafA&list=PLiOhBg8WdMaLx_cg5FmBEA0hUvnrsplKl&index=44&t=0s)
:   This video details how to set and edit the visibility range for a feature layer in ArcGIS Pro.

[Signing into ArcGIS Online (AGOL) using the W&M Enterprise Login](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=x07Xyoe0d2k&list=PLiOhBg8WdMaLx_cg5FmBEA0hUvnrsplKl&index=27&t=0s)
:   This video details how to sign into ArcGIS Online (AGOL) using the W&M Enterprise Login.

[Starting with ArcGIS Modelbuilder](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KtgAQXEJLHk&list=PLiOhBg8WdMaLx_cg5FmBEA0hUvnrsplKl&index=24&t=0s)
:   This video details how to create a new Model using ArcGIS Modelbuilder, with an introduction on loading tools and data into the model.
    See also, [ArcPro Model Builder: A Simple Guide](https://unstable-ground-consulting.github.io/Landslide-Susceptibility/How-To/) by the Unstable Ground Consulting group from Advanced GIS Fall 2020.

[Survey123](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=J8a6ANcgvnU&list=PLiOhBg8WdMaLx_cg5FmBEA0hUvnrsplKl&index=20&t=0s)
:   This video details how to access the Survey123 website with a walkthrough of an example survey form.

[Using Catalog View](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YJ6Duz_o4zU&list=PLiOhBg8WdMaLx_cg5FmBEA0hUvnrsplKl&index=4&t=0s)
:   This video details how to open and explore catalog view in an ArcGIS Pro project.

[Using data.census.gov](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8Cebi_fUwFM&list=PLiOhBg8WdMaLx_cg5FmBEA0hUvnrsplKl&index=49&t=0s)
:   This video details how to search for tabular data using data.census.gov, and then download the table for use in ArcGIS Pro.

[Using Google Takeout](https://youtu.be/W7sAHmQTxmA)
:   This video demonstrates how to use Google Takeout to extract starred locations from your Google Maps and import them to GIS.
